sentences: Alwynne Pritchard (born 1968) is a British performer, composer, artist and curator based in Bergen, Norway.
Pritchard was born in Glasgow.
From 2008 and until March 2014, she was artistic director of the Borealis Festival in Bergen, and from 2001 until 2008, she taught composition at  Trinity College of Music in London.
Pritchard also worked for many years as a freelance writer and presenter for BBC Radio 3 including Music in Our Time, Midnight Oil, Music Matters, Hear and Now, and Discovering Music.
In January 2016, she took up the position of Artistic Director of the BIT20 Ensemble.
